flawed_nl_solution:
Since 5 students from each of the 6 math classes have volunteered, there are 5*6= <<5*6=30>>30 total student volunteers.
In addition to the 30 student volunteers, 13 teachers have also volunteered so there are 30+13= <<30+13=39>>39 total volunteers.
Mr. Johnson needs 50 volunteers and currently has 39 volunteers, so he needs 50-39= <<50-39=11>>11 more volunteers.
#### 11

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 43, not 39. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
